summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AUTO NATION FORD IN MARGATE, FL TO BE REPAIRED PER NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V209000 (ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING). THE DEALER STATED THAT THE HOSES NEEDED TO BE REPLACED TO COMPLETE THE RECALL REPAIR. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO DIAGNOSED THAT THE FAILURE WAS RELATED TO THE RECALL AND THAT THE COOLANT LEVEL SENSOR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED TO DETERMINE THE APPROPRIATE REPAIR SOLUTION. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 45,545. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
